import React, { useRef } from 'react' import { useQuery, useMutation } from '@apollo/react-hooks' import { Button, Checkbox, Form } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { USER_REGISTER_MUTATION } from '../query' const Register = () => { const username = useRef() const email = useRef() const password = useRef() const passwordConfirm = useRef() const [ register, { data } ] = useMutation(USER_REGISTER_MUTATION); const handleOnSubmit = () => { const usernameValue = username.current.valueSubmit const emailValue = email.current.valueSubmit const passwordValue = password.current.valueSubmit const passwordConfirmValue = passwordConfirm.current.valueSubmit } return (
) } export default Register
